  • Help

    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Agent
    This interface is used to define the agent's name, the agent's state, and the agent's callback.
    BinOpAgent
    This class is used to perform a binary operation on the received messages and publish the result to an output topic.
    Config
    This interface defines the methods that must be implemented by any class that represents a configuration.
    ConfLoader
    This class is used to handle incoming requests related to configuration loading.
    DecreaseAgent
    This class is used to decrement the received message by 1 and publish the result to an output topic.
    DivideAgent
    This class is used to divide the received messages and publish the result to an output topic.
    GenericConfig
    This class implements the Config interface and is used to create and manage agents based on a configuration file.
    Graph
    This class is used to create a graph from topics with the correct connections between nodes.
    HtmlGraphWriter
    This class is used to generate an HTML representation of a given graph.
    HtmlLoader
    This class is used to handle incoming requests related to HTML file loading.
    HtmlReader
    This class provides a method to read an HTML file and return its content as a string.
    HTTPServer
     
    IncAgent
    This class is used to increment the received message by 1 and publish the result to an output topic.
    Main
     
    Message
    This class is used to create a message object with a string, double, and date.
    ModAgent
    This class is used to calculate the modulo of two messages and publish the result to an output topic.
    MultiplyAgent
    This class is used to multiply two messages and publish the result to an output topic.
    MyHTTPServer
    This class represents a simple HTTP server that can handle multiple client connections concurrently.
    Node
    This class is used to represent a node in the graph.
    ParallelAgent
    This class is used to wrap an existing agent and provide parallelism by sending messages to the agent from a separate thread.
    ParallelAgent.MessageQueued
    This class is used to hold a topic and a message together in queue.
    PlusAgent
    This class is used to implement the PlusAgent.
    PowAgent
    This class is used to implement the PowAgent.
    RequestParser
    This class is used to parse an HTTP request and extract relevant information.
    RequestParser.RequestInfo
    A class representing parsed information from an HTTP request.
    Servlet
     
    SqrtAgent
    This class is used to implement the SqrtAgent.
    SubtractAgent
    This class is used to subtract the second message from the first message and publish the result to an output topic.
    Topic
    This class is used to represent a topic in the system.
    TopicDisplayer
    This class is used to handle incoming requests related to topic display.
    TopicManagerSingleton
     
    TopicManagerSingleton.TopicManager
